verses.verse: <S%G5101>What<s%> shall we <S%G2046>say<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> that <S%G11>Abraham<s%> our <S%G3962>father,<s%> as pertaining to the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> has <S%G2147>found?<s%>
For <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> were <S%G1344>justified<s%> by <S%G2041>works,<s%> he <S%G2192>has<s%> whereof to <S%G2745>glory;<s%> but not <S%G4314>before<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>
For <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> the <S%G1124>scripture?<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> and it was <S%G3049>counted<s%> to him for <S%G1343>righteousness.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> to him that <S%G2038>works<s%> is the <S%G3408>reward<s%> not <S%G3049>reckoned<s%> of <S%G5485>grace,<s%> but of <S%G3783>debt.<s%>

But to him that <S%G2038>works<s%> not, but <S%G4100>believes<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> him that <S%G1344>justifies<s%> the <S%G765>ungodly,<s%> his <S%G4102>faith<s%> is <S%G3049>counted<s%> for <S%G1343>righteousness.<s%>

<S%G2509>Even<s%> as <S%G1138>David<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3004>describes<s%> the <S%G3108>blessedness<s%> of the <S%G444>man,<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3049>imputes<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%>
Saying, <S%G3107>Blessed<s%> are they <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G458>iniquities<s%> are <S%G863>forgiven,<s%> and <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%> are <S%G1943>covered.<s%>
<S%G3107>Blessed<s%> is the <S%G435>man<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> will not <S%G3049>impute<s%> <S%G266>sin.<s%>

Comes <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3108>blessedness<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> on the <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> only, <S%G2228>or<s%> on the <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%> <S%G2532>also?<s%> for we <S%G3004>say<s%> that <S%G4102>faith<s%> was <S%G3049>reckoned<s%> to <S%G11>Abraham<s%> for <S%G1343>righteousness.<s%>

<S%G4459>How<s%> was it <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G3049>reckoned?<s%> when he was in <S%G4061>circumcision,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> in <S%G203>uncircumcision?<s%> Not in <S%G4061>circumcision,<s%> but in <S%G203>uncircumcision.<s%>

And he <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G4592>sign<s%> of <S%G4061>circumcision,<s%> a <S%G4973>seal<s%> of the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of the <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> he had yet being <S%G1722>uncircumcised:<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G203><s%> that he might be the <S%G3962>father<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> them that <S%G4100>believe,<s%> <S%G1223>though<s%> they be not <S%G203>circumcised;<s%> that <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> might be <S%G3049>imputed<s%> to them <S%G2532>also:<s%>

And the <S%G3962>father<s%> of <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> to them <S%G3588>who<s%> are not of the <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> but <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4748>walk<s%> in the <S%G2487>steps<s%> of that <S%G4102>faith<s%> of our <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> which he had being yet <S%G1722>uncircumcised.<s%>

For the <S%G1860>promise,<s%> that he should be the <S%G2818>heir<s%> of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> was not to <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> to his <S%G4690>seed,<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> but <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G4102>faith.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> they which are of the <S%G3551>law<s%> be <S%G2818>heirs,<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> is <S%G2758>made<s%> <S%G2758>void,<s%> and the <S%G1860>promise<s%> <S%G2673>made<s%> of <S%G2673>none<s%> <S%G2673>effect:<s%>
<S%G1063>Because<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G2716>works<s%> <S%G3709>wrath:<s%> for <S%G3757>where<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> is, there is <S%G3761>no<s%> <S%G3847>transgression.<s%>

<S%G1233>Therefore<s%> <S%G5124><s%> it is of <S%G4102>faith,<s%> that it might be by <S%G5485>grace;<s%> to the <S%G1519>end<s%> the <S%G1860>promise<s%> might be <S%G949>sure<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4690>seed;<s%> not to that <S%G3440>only<s%> which is of the <S%G3551>law,<s%> but to that <S%G2532>also<s%> which is of the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham;<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> is the <S%G3962>father<s%> of us <S%G3956>all,<s%>

(As it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> I have <S%G5087>made<s%> you a <S%G3962>father<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1484>nations,<s%>) <S%G2713>before<s%> him <S%G3739>whom<s%> he <S%G4100>believed,<s%> even <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2227>vivifies<s%> the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> and <S%G2564>calls<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> things which be not as though they were.

<S%G3739>Who<s%> <S%G3844>against<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> in <S%G1680>hope,<s%> that he might <S%G1096>become<s%> the <S%G3962>father<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1484>nations,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to that which was <S%G2046>spoken,<s%> <S%G3779>So<s%> shall your <S%G4690>seed<s%> be.

And being not <S%G770>weak<s%> in <S%G4102>faith,<s%> he <S%G2657>considered<s%> not his <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G2236>now<s%> <S%G3499>dead,<s%> when he was <S%G4225>about<s%> an <S%G1541>hundred<s%> <S%G1541>years<s%> <S%G1541>old,<s%> neither yet the <S%G3500>deadness<s%> of <S%G4564>Sarah's<s%> <S%G3388>womb:<s%>

He <S%G1252>staggered<s%> not <S%G1519>at<s%> the <S%G1860>promise<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> through <S%G570>unbelief;<s%> but was <S%G1743>strong<s%> in <S%G4102>faith,<s%> giving <S%G1391>glory<s%> to <S%G2316>God;<s%>
And being <S%G4135>fully<s%> <S%G4135>persuaded<s%> that, <S%G3739>what<s%> he had <S%G1861>promised,<s%> he was <S%G1415>able<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G4160>perform.<s%>
And <S%G1352>therefore<s%> it was <S%G3049>imputed<s%> to him for <S%G1343>righteousness.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> it was not <S%G1125>written<s%> for his sake <S%G3440>alone,<s%> that it was <S%G3049>imputed<s%> to him;

But for us <S%G2532>also,<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> it shall be <S%G3049>imputed,<s%> if we <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> him that <S%G1453>raised<s%> up <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead;<s%>
<S%G3739>Who<s%> was <S%G3860>delivered<s%> for our <S%G3900>offenses,<s%> and was <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G1453>again<s%> for our <S%G1347>justification.<s%>
